items.title: Federal Judge Questions Deportations to Ghana
items.summary: A hearing in the case of five migrants deported to Ghana last week showed how earlier Supreme Court rulings have paved the way for President Trump’s mass deportation campaign.

items.title: After Charlie Kirk Killing, Suspect Joked That His ‘Doppelganger’ Did It
items.summary: Before he was arrested on suspicion of carrying out the assassination, 22-year-old Tyler Robinson sent friends messages showing that he was closely following news about the killing.

items.title: Van Hollen Criticizes Democratic Leaders for Delay in Endorsing Mamdani
items.summary: At an annual fund-raiser in Iowa, the Maryland Democrat said he supported Zohran Mamdani for mayor of New York City and said people were sick of “spineless politics.”

items.title: Wrestling Over Charlie Kirk’s Legacy and the Divide in America

items.title: Trump Escalates Attacks on Political Opponents After Charlie Kirk’s Killing
items.summary: President Trump has promised to bring the killer to justice while using the moment to blame the left — and only the left — more broadly.

items.title: Trump news at a glance: Kirk critics lose jobs amid rancour after killing
items.summary: <p>Numerous firings reported as authorities search out commentary deemed offensive on conservative free speech advocate’s killing – key stories from 13 September 2025 at a glance</p><p>The killing of Charlie Kirk has prompted a crackdown by authorities on critical commentary, with numerous people losing their jobs over their reaction to the fatal shooting of the conservative activist and free speech advocate.</p><p>Those fired, suspended or censured in recent days include teachers, firefighters, journalists, politicians, a <a href="https://www.foxnews.com/politics/secret-service-employee-who-celebrated-charlie-kirks-assassination-put-immediate-leave">Secret Service employee</a>, a <a href="https://www.yahoo.com/news/articles/nasdaq-terminates-employee-over-social-180948755.html?guccounter=1">junior strategist at Nasdaq</a> and a <a href="https://www.wral.com/news/local/panthers-employee-fired-controversial-comments-charlie-kirk-death-raleigh/">worker for a prominent NFL team</a>.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/14/trump-administration-charlie-kirk-news-updates-latest">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Questions linger about alleged shooter’s motivation for killing Charlie Kirk
items.summary: <p>Suspect’s background and politics are being pored over in aftermath of killing of far-right influencer</p><p>Though the suspect in the <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/charlie-kirk-shooting">killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk</a> was revealed by authorities on Friday, questions surrounding his identity and motivations have exacerbated intense US political debates in the aftermath of the shooting.</p><p>Authorities revealed Kirk’s suspected killer to be Tyler Robinson, a 22-year-old man who grew up in Washington, <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/utah">Utah</a>, along the state’s south-western border.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/13/charlie-kirk-killing-alleged-shooter-motivation">Continue reading...</a>
